attributes.action: We the victors of the EU referendum, demand the government uphold the decision
attributes.background:
The vote for the Eu referendum has been made a mockery, by allowing a petition to be created calling for a 2nd.
We are not in the playground, this is not a game, it's not "best out of 3"!
The decision has been made by the people in accordance to the parliament regulations, and this will be upheld!
